msbt.message: Dear ,
To ,
Hello, !
Hi, !
I want you to know that I really appreciate your thoughtfulness.
Your kind gift really took me by surprise and warmed my heart.
I was touched by your generosity and just loved your gift!
You made me feel appreciated with that sweet present.
It's so nice to be given something unexpected and from the heart.
It means a lot that you took time and care to pick out such a nice present just for me!
Writing this message, I'm trying to find the perfect words so that my feelings reach deep in your heart.
I hope you know my gratitude is sincere. I feel really lucky to know someone as generous as you.
The note you included was also really sweet. I've read it over and over since receiving your gift.
Sitting here writing this note to you is enough to fill me with gratitude all over again. You make me smile!
Hope to see you again soon!
Come find me next time you're out.
Let's chat again real soon!
Please come by to visit me anytime!
I'm sure I'll be in touch again soon.
From
Sincerely,
All my heart,
That's all for now. –
